code: /**  * Method that is called on an {@link org.apache.flink.api.common.io.OutputFormat} when it is passed to  * the DataSet's output method. May be used to configures the output format based on the data type.  *  * @param type The data type of the input.  * @param executionConfig The execution config for this parallel execution.  */ void setInputType(TypeInformation<?> type, ExecutionConfig executionConfig).
